articles.title: Cam Newton calls Drake Maye a game manager in his latest shot at Patriots QB
articles.description:
The former New England signal-caller pushed back against saying Maye was a top-five QB and called the Patriots “fool’s gold” earlier in the season.

The post Cam Newton calls Drake Maye a game manager in his latest shot at Patriots QB appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Wall Street edges higher in a wobbly start to 2026
articles.description:
Markets were mostly quiet on the first trading day of 2026, with the influential technology sector driving much of the up-and-down action.

The post Wall Street edges higher in a wobbly start to 2026 appeared first on Boston.com.
